phrs.translation: 原始的, 本初的, 最初的, 始生纪
原始卵泡, 始基卵泡, 原始卵胞
原始生殖细胞, 原始性细胞, 原始胚细胞
原始汤, 原生汤, 原始热汤, 原生浆液
原始生殖细胞, 生殖细胞, 或原始生殖细胞

sentences.sentence: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.translation: 两千万年前，爱达荷州遍布着茂密的原始森林。

sentences.sentence: It is hypothesized that the primordial cloud of dust and gas from which all the planets are thought to have condensed had a composition somewhat similar to that of Jupiter.
sentences.translation: 据推测，所有行星都是由尘埃和气体组成的原始云团凝聚而成，其组成与木星的组成有些相似。

sentences.sentence: Twenty million years ago, Idaho was not the arid place it is now. Rather, it was warm and damp, populated by dense primordial forest.
sentences.translation: 2000万年前，爱达荷州不像现在这样干旱。确切地说，它那时温暖潮湿，生长着茂密的原始森林。
